snippet: Pope Benedict XVI traveled to Lebanon with a message that took on wider resonance as anti-American protests spread to some 20 countries.
abstract: Pope Benedict XVI travels to Lebanon with a message of tolerance that takes on wider resonance as anti-American protests over anit-Islam video spreads to some 20 countries; Benedict calls for an end to violence in Syria, even as protesters 50 miles away attack American restaurant chain in Tripoli.

byline.original: By KAREEM FAHIM and RACHEL DONADIO
byline.contributor: Kareem Fahim reported from Beirut, and Rachel Donadio from Rome and Vatican City. Hania Mourtada and Hwaida Saad contributed reporting.

lead_paragraph: Pope Benedict XVI traveled to Lebanon with a message that took on wider resonance as anti-American protests spread to some 20 countries.

headline.seo: Pope Takes Message of Tolerance to Lebanon
headline.main: Benedict Takes Message of Tolerance to Lebanon
headline.print_headline: Benedict Takes Message Of Tolerance to Lebanon
